MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH66 postcode area of Ellesmere Port, affecting properties in Ledsham Court, Black Lion Lane and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 06:18AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are working to repair an underground cable fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 09:15AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:28AM on 12th December 2020
